Join us at R+AI 2025, our inaugural conference dedicated to the open-source 
R community and every facet of artificial intelligence. 

![](images/R+AI-main-image.png)

### **Dates:** Nov 12–13, 2025
### **Location:** 100% online
### Program, speakers, and registration: Coming Soon 
### **Call for Proposals:** [Open Now!](cfp.qmd)  

Whether you're just getting started with machine learning, experimenting 
with large language models in R, leveraging GenAI tools to accelerate your 
code, part of an industry team deploying AI solutions in finance, 
healthcare, or marketing, or a researcher pushing the boundaries of deep 
learning or responsible AI—there's something here for you. 

Experience inspiring keynotes and talks, hands-on workshops, lightning 
talks, and panel discussions designed to educate, connect, and empower 
R users at every level.


- **Talks will be recorded**  
- **Speakers participate in live Q&A**  
- **Schedule is US Eastern Time Zone**
